objects.text:
• Luxurious woven texture pattern
• Genuine leather construction
• Memory foam insole for comfort
• Classic style for formal & casual

product_details.name: Premium Classic Comfort Penny Loafer - Refined Men's Slip-On Dress Shoe
product_details.description:
• Luxurious woven texture pattern adds sophisticated style
• Genuine leather construction ensures durability and longevity
• Breathable perforated upper design for all-day comfort
• Classic penny loafer style suitable for both formal and casual occasions
• Flexible rubber sole provides excellent traction and stability
• Rich brown color versatile for any outfit combination
• Memory foam insole for superior cushioning and support
• Slip-on design for easy wearing and removal
• Hand-stitched detailing demonstrates premium craftsmanship
• Lightweight construction ideal for extended wear

banner_details:
This banner features a stylish and modern layout designed to highlight a premium men's footwear product. The background consists of an angular division with rich brown gradients on one side and a subtle beige tone on the other, creating visual depth. The "heading" and "subheading" text layers prominently showcase the product title and category, using bold and clear fonts. The "description" text lists key features in a bullet-point format, emphasizing craftsmanship and comfort. A dynamic product image ("product_image") is rotated and scaled to add motion and emphasis. The price is featured in the "price" text layer, with a beige-toned "cta_button" labeled by the "cta" text, encouraging action.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Brown: #3B2A1C
- Medium Brown: #5E3A1F
- Beige: #D2B48C
- Light Beige: #E6CCAA
- Cream: #F8F1E5
product_color: The product image showcases a dark brown loafer with a rich, consistent color scheme that balances texture and elegance. The primary color is a deep chocolate brown (#3B2F2F), used across the shoe’s body, creating a bold and masculine tone. The woven pattern on the sides adds depth and interest through subtle contrast with a slightly darker brown (#2A1F1F), while a semi-glossy, smooth strap detail at the top uses a refined mocha brown (#4A3B3B) to accentuate the design. For an advertisement banner, a palette with earthy neutrals—beige (#D6CFC7), warm tan (#B89B82), and off-white (#F5F5F5)—can complement the product’s premium look.
